short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy SVG icons and images from any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly capture and save SVG icons and images from any website with Grab SVG. This powerful Chrome extension allows you to:

1. Copy inline SVG elements directly to your clipboard
2. Download SVG files with a single click
3. Access SVG content even when it's hidden behind pointer-event restrictions

Perfect for designers, developers, and anyone who needs quick access to vector graphics. Grab SVG adds a convenient context menu option that appears only when hovering over SVG elements, ensuring a clean and unobtrusive browsing experience.

Key features:
- Context-aware menu activation
- One-click copy to clipboard
- Easy SVG file downloads
- Works on all websites
- Lightweight and fast
- Compatible with popular design software like Figma, Adobe Illustrator, and others

Streamline your workflow and never struggle to extract SVG content again. Install Grab SVG now and start collecting vector graphics with ease!

If you encounter any issues or the extension isn't working as expected, please contact me via email.

Icon of a squirrel in the screenshot is taken from Lucide.
